KPI Card

This template is used to display KPIs in a card.

To use this template, you need to config three data sources.

First data source is used to get the now value.

Second data source is used to get the previous value.

Third data source is used to get the target value.

For example, you want to display the total revenue of this month and the total revenue of last month.

First data source is used to get the total revenue of this month.

Second data source is used to get the total revenue of last month.

Third data source is used to get the target revenue of this month.

Then you can use the formula to calculate the KPIs.
